__e: And you... came home to your family... to test how good you were... because now, maybe, you're going to start one of your own.
But I know that you're an even better father and you always come home to your boys.
You give everything to your patients and then you come home, and everybody wants something from you, and yes,
Look, it's either yes... or I make a phone call. And you go back to prison.
Well, why don't you come back to bed, and let's see if I can do anything to help.
If you get on the line that doesn't know what they want, you never get back.
You get to go back to your home, to your life and your family, and I...
But I know that you're an even better father and you always come home to your boys.
You give everything to your patients and then you come home, and everybody wants something from you, and yes,
Then why don't you just leave and go back to them?
- You know, you always come back with a different name, but underneath you're always somehow the same.

And then you come back in one year and you're sitting right back here across the same desk from us again and somebody out there is hurt or dead.
